additionalInformation: The item's attributes grants the following additional bonuses:
192 mana, 0.8 mana regeneration and 1.6% flat base magic resistance.
11.2 main attack damage to universal heroes.
name: Kaya
description: The staff of a renowned sorceress, lost for countless millennia.
trivia: The item's internal name was Trident until November 30, 2017 Patch.
